function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High scores in majority of impact criteria","Impact":"Positive impacts on building domains but potential for complacency in regards to disease mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Regular review and assessment of building domains for disease mitigation measures","Technologies":"IoT sensors, AI for predictive maintenance, building automation systems","People":"Building occupants, facilities managers, building owners","Owner":"Facilities managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Low scores in flexibility and storage criteria","Impact":"Reduced ability to adapt to disease mitigation strategies due to limited flexibility and storage","Mitigation":"Integration of grid connection, on-site electricity generation, and storage units","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, energy storage solutions","People":"Building occupants, facilities managers, building owners","Owner":"Building owners"}]}
